name: Frigade
headline: Growth platform for modern software teams
description: Frigade helps growth teams better activate and up-sell customers in-product. We combine React UI components such as <Tour />, <Checklist />, and <Announcement /> with a web app to easily power user targeting, content, orchestration, and more.

founders.name: Eric Brownrout, Founder
founders.description: Eric is the co-founder and CEO of Frigade. Before founding Frigade, Eric co-founded Perform, a mobile app to help runners reach their goals through a combination of AI and 1:1 human coaching. Prior to that, he worked in product management at Digit where he helped launch an AI-powered mobile banking app and at LinkedIn where he managed an intelligent communications platform for notifications and email.

founders.name: Christian Mathiesen, Founder
founders.description: Christian is the co-founder and CTO of Frigade. Before founding Frigade, Christian co-founded Perform, a platform to help runners reach their goals through a combination of AI and 1:1 human coaching. Prior to that, he worked in engineering at LinkedIn where he helped launch LinkedIn's Skills-based hiring products and LinkedIn's Hiring Platform.

generated_description:
### Meet Frigade

**Website:** [frigade.com](https://frigade.com)  
**Founded:** 2022  
**Location:** San Francisco, CA  
**Team Size:** 4 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** W23  
**Group Partner:** Michael Seibel  

#### Mission
Frigade is a growth platform tailored for modern software teams, specifically designed to enhance customer activation and upselling right within the product experience. By offering seamless integration of React UI components like `<Tour />`, `<Checklist />`, and `<Announcement />`, they empower growth teams to engage users effectively through targeted content, orchestration, and user experiences.

#### What They Do
Frigade provides a modern product adoption platform that enables teams to:

- **Create engaging in-app experiences**: Build product tours, checklists, and announcements without involving engineering changes.
- **Drive user activation and onboarding**: Design personalized paths for users to increase adoption of features and improve the overall user experience.
- **Utilize their flexible APIs**: Easily integrate with Next.js and React to ship faster with embeddable UIs.

Their solutions cater to various use cases like product marketing, revenue expansion, feature adoption, and user research.

#### Current Offerings
- **Components Library**: Their library includes reusable components that teams can leverage to create cohesive product experiences.
- **Documentation and Developer Resources**: With a focus on ease of use, Frigade provides ample documentation to onboard developers quickly.
- **Free Sign-Up and Demos**: New users can start for free, explore their product’s capabilities, and view demos without any initial cost.

#### Customer Base
Frigade is trusted by a diverse array of fast-growing companies, notably in the tech sector. Their clientele includes organizations like Merge, Leya, and Hiive, all using Frigade to streamline user engagement and optimize their product’s onboarding processes.

#### Summary
Frigade emerged from the tech hub of San Francisco and is gaining traction among product-led teams looking for efficient methods to enhance customer journeys. Their focus on simplicity and adaptability makes them a compelling choice for businesses aiming to accelerate user adoption and engagement. If you're in the software space and want to streamline user experiences, Frigade might just be the growth partner you need.

--- 

Explore Frigade's offerings and get started today at [frigade.com](https://frigade.com)!
